changelog: âœ¨ UNIFIED INTEGRATION DASHBOARD: Combined all 22 integrations (11 user-facing + 11 infrastructure) into single health dashboard at /integrations/health. Features: (1) Category filtering - All/User-Facing/Infrastructure tabs with purple/green badges. (2) Enhanced metrics - 5 summary cards (Active, User-Facing, Infrastructure, Avg Response, Error Rate). (3) Integration details - Each card shows category badge, status, response time, error rate, cost. (4) Sidebar link - Added ðŸ”Œ Integrations button between Archie and Transcribe. (5) Back navigation - Link to return to main chat. User-facing integrations: Vercel AI SDK, Redis Cache, Gemini Flash/Pro, DeepSeek, Perplexity, ElevenLabs, FLUX, Voice Input, pgvector, Knowledge Graph. Infrastructure integrations: OpenAI, Claude, Google Workspace, AssemblyAI, Zapier, Cost Monitor, NextAuth, Supabase, GitHub, Notion, Todoist. Build successful. All integrations now visible in one unified dashboard with comprehensive filtering.

mcp.reason: 66% failure rate, zero unique value vs existing RAG system

archie2.reason: Over-engineered. Simple git-based version works better

guardian.reason: Vestigial, non-functional. No actual implementation existed
guardian.filesRemoved: Documentation sections in CLAUDE.md, breadcrumb labels

coreFeatures.rag: AutoReferenceButler - 626 lines of intelligent context gathering
coreFeatures.semanticSearch: RAG Search System - 602 lines with hybrid vector+keyword search
coreFeatures.embeddings: Embedding Cache - 445 lines with 80-90% hit rate
coreFeatures.knowledgeGraph: Knowledge Graph - 553 lines with entity/relationship tracking
coreFeatures.database: pgvector with HNSW indexes for fast similarity search
coreFeatures.archie: Simple git-based maintenance - 466 lines, hourly cron, auto-commits fixes
coreFeatures.voiceInput: Web Speech API - real-time speech-to-text in chat input
coreFeatures.gemini: Google Gemini 2.5 Flash/Pro - FREE tier (1,500/50 RPD) as DEFAULT chat models
coreFeatures.deepseek: DeepSeek V3.2 bulk processing - 100+ docs, 4 task types, $0.27/$1.10 per 1M tokens
coreFeatures.perplexity: Perplexity Sonar Pro - AI search with citations, $0.005 per search
coreFeatures.elevenlabs: ElevenLabs Turbo v2.5 - TTS voice output, FREE 10K chars/month
coreFeatures.flux: FLUX 1.1 Pro - Image generation, $0.055 per image
